channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Removal needed for melted green bin hit by arson, 25th November
item.description:
Someone has set this bin on fire, most likely with fireworks. Please remove it as it is totally unusable, unsafe and an eyesore, please remove.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 85, Fenham Road, Peckham, Greater London

item.description:

item.title: Dumped bed and Mattresses, 25th November
item.description:
The alley way between 9 and 11 Wallace Close, SE28 8NL. More beds, mattresses and other things have been dumped in this alley way and is nuisance as we have to move/clear these items to use the foot path. Wheelie bins on the parking area of 7 and 9 Wallace Close are over flowing and rubbish on the floor

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wallace Close, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
